p: The data were analyzed by one‐way analysis of variance (ANOVA), using SPSS 16 statistical package (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA). The Duncan test was used to determine statistically significant differences between the means. p values < .05 were considered statistically significant for all comparisons. Values were reported as mean ± standard deviation ( SD) of duplicate treatments (six repetitions for each formula) (Amiri‐Rigi, Mohammadifar, Emam‐Djomeh, & Mohammadi, 2011).
